====================================================
Documentation for ldv_powertrain_characteristics.csv
====================================================

This file contains values for key powertrain characteristics for light-duty vehicles by vehicle model year that are used in calculating amounts of fuel and electric power consumed.

File Structure
--------------
Each row is a vehicle model year from 1975 to 2050.
Column names as follows:
Year: The year to which the data apply
AutoIcevMpg: The average fuel economy (miles per gasoline gallon equivalent) of automobiles with internal combustion engine powertrains
LtTrkIcevMpg: The average fuel economy (miles per gasoline gallon equivalent) of light trucks with internal combustion engine powertrains
AutoHevMpg: The average fuel economy (miles per gasoline gallon equivalent) of automobiles with hybrid electric powertrains
LtTrkHevMpg: The average fuel economy (miles per gasoline gallon equivalent) of light trucks with hybrid electric powertrains
AutoPhevMpg: The average fuel economy (miles per gasoline gallon equivalent) of automobiles with plug-in hybrid electric powertrains
AutoPhevMpkwh: The average electric efficiency (miles per kilowatt-hour) of automobiles with plug-in hybrid electric powertrains
AutoPhevRange: The average electric-only travel range on a fully charged battery of automobiles with plug-in hybrid electric powertrains
LtTrkPhevMpg: The average fuel economy (miles per gasoline gallon equivalent) of light trucks with plug-in hybrid electric powertrains
LtTrkPhevMpkwh: The average electric efficiency (miles per kilowatt-hour) of light trucks with plug-in hybrid electric powertrains
LtTrkPhevRange: The average electric-only travel range on a fully charged battery of light trucks with plug-in hybrid electric powertrains
AutoBevMpkwh: The average electric efficiency (miles per kilowatt-hour) of automobiles with battery electric powertrains
AutoBevRange: The average travel range on a fully charged battery of automobiles with battery electric powertrains
LtTrkBevMpkwh: The average electric efficiency (miles per kilowatt-hour) of light trucks with battery electric powertrains
LtTrkBevRange: The average travel range on a fully charged battery of light trucks with battery electric powertrains

Source:
-------
These are demonstration data developed for the purpose of creating and testing modules. Data comes from various sources used to develop values for Oregon and other sources.
